Description: The FHIR Observation resource defines measurements and assertions about a patient, including vital signs, laboratory data, imaging results, devices measurements, clinical assessment tools, personal characteristics, social history, and core characteristics.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Use "core-characteristics" to search for characteristics observations.
category.Optional: Either this or code must be provided, not both.

code.Name: code
code.Optional: Either this or category must be provided, not both.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource. If both patient and subject are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Observation.Name: Observation
Observation.Description: An instance of the R4 Observation resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description: This is LOINC code 76516-4 for BGA or LOINC code 8339-4 for birth weight.

issued.Name: issued
issued.Description: The instant when this observation was last edited.

valueCodeableConcept.Name: valueCodeableConcept
valueCodeableConcept.Description:
Available starting in February 2022.

The following values, depending on the type of data returned:

  • Delivery method: LOINC 73762-7
  • Labor duration: LOINC 32396-4
  • Hospital name: LOINC 62330-6
  • Hospital location: LOINC 62331-4

valueQuantity.Name: valueQuantity
valueQuantity.Description:
Available starting in February 2022.

The following values, depending on the type of data returned:

  • Birth weight: LOINC code 8339-4
  • Gestational age: LOINC code 76516-4
  • Birth length: LOINC 8291-7
  • Birth head circumference: LOINC 8290-9, 8291-7
  • Birth APGAR scores
    • APGAR 1: LOINC 9272-6
    • APGAR 5: LOINC 9274 -2
    • APGAR 10: LOINC  9271-8
  • Hospital Days

valueString.Name: valueString
valueString.Description:
The following values, depending on the type of data returned:

  • Delivery method: LOINC 73762-7
  • Labor duration: LOINC 32396-4
  • Hospital name: LOINC 62330-6
  • Hospital location: LOINC 62331-4
